jobDescription: GENERAL SUMMARY & SCOPE The Business Intelligence Analyst II will be responsible for defining business needs and helping to develop innovative solutions that meet business reporting objectives. This individual will serve as the liaison between IT and the business partners engaging in translating business requirements into conceptual, logical, and physical data models. He/she will support projects through the solution development lifecycle and creating ad-hoc reports on an as needed basis. PRINCIPAL JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES (*Essential Functions)  1. Develop data models to support reporting and analytical needs  2. Create reports and dashboards to measure and inform business partners on KPI’s and metrics  3. Partner with IT on data requirements needed to support the build of data models  4. Partner with business teams to gather, document and maintain business requirements that will inform data modeling decisions  5.
